testcase.name: testPaging
testcase.error:
org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: ### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00933: SQL 명령어가 올바르게 종료되지 않았습니다
https://docs.oracle.com/error-help/db/ora-00933/ ### The error may exist in net/developia/mapper/BoardMapper.xml ### The error may involve defaultParameterMap ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn ,bno , title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where bno > 0 offset (?-1)*? rows fetch first ? rows only; ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00933: SQL 명령어가 올바르게 종료되지 않았습니다
